product.name: My Product
product.pitch: i built this cool tool that does X. my friends and i have been seeing great results from it
product.linkMessage: check it out if you want: https://yourproduct.com/
product.askMessage: its free rn btw. if you think your audience would find it useful, even a quick story mention would mean a lot
product.followUpMessage: hey just following up, did you get a chance to check it out? would love your honest thoughts. no pressure at all!

hooks.resume: your resume tips are so real
hooks.interview: your interview advice is actually so good
hooks.visa: your visa stuff is literally what people need rn
hooks.linkedin: your linkedin tips are fire honestly
hooks.job search: your job search content hit different
hooks.career: your career content is genuinely helpful
hooks.hiring: your hiring takes are so on point
hooks.layoff: your take on the layoff stuff is so real
